label: MP22ZP
description: Z-Wave Outdoor Smart Plug with Power Meter

metadata.inclusion:
1. Follow the instructions for your Z-Wave certified controller to add a device to the Z-Wave network.
2. Once the controller is ready to add your device, press the Manual/Program button on the smart plug 3 time quickly. The blue LED will blink quickly.
metadata.exclusion:
1. Follow the instructions for your Z-Wave certified controller to remove a device to the Z-Wave network.
2. Once the controller is ready to remove your device, press the manual/program button on the smart plug 3 times quickly.
metadata.reset: Click the button twice quickly then hold for at least 10 seconds.
